item.description:
Let's do something different on Memorial Day (Sunday) Weekend and enjoy our wonderful city.
Our plan is to take the water taxi, enjoy the harbor views, walk around the Charles Town Navy Yard and USS Constitution property. Finally, we will have cocktails and dinner at the Barking Crab PLEASE SEE CHANGE IN RESTAURANT. (If you can only attend the dinner - please note on your RSVP)

NEW DINNER LOCATION - 6:30PM Boston Sail Loft 80 Atlantic Avenue, Boston, MA 02110-3614 (617) 227-7280

First , we will meet in "Christopher Columbus Waterfront Park at 3:15p (across Atlantic Ave from Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market next to the Marriott Hotel) . We will walk past the Aquarium T stop along side of the Marriott Hotel toward the New England Aquarium to Long Wharf dock. Walk down metal the gang plank to sign that says "MBTA Water Taxi". This ride is $1.70 each way, free with a Charlie Card Link Pass.
MBTA Water taxi leaves every 30 minutes , so if you miss the 3:30p; take the next taxi and ride back to Long Wharf with the group on the 5:15p.

The MBTA Water Taxi Route F4 leaves from Long Wharf to Charles Town Navy Yard (short 10 minute ride) After we will arrive on the dock we walk 10 minutes to the Navy Yard Pier and go through a security screening to enter the Navy yard. This could take time depending on crowds/wait times. You must have a valid ID. Note: You do not have go to through security screening to go visit the USS Constitution Museum which is also FREE.

This may only be a museum visit as there could be long lines to board the USS Constitution. Make plans to get there earlier if you'd like to make the tour. The ship tour and the museum self guided tour are FREE

At 5p, we will meet at the water taxi dock for return to Long Wharf. We will board the taxi at 5:15p and arrive at Long Wharf at 5:25p. Sound good so far?


NEW DINNER LOCATION - 6:30PM Boston Sail Loft 80 Atlantic Avenue, Boston, MA 02110-3614 (617) 227-7280
Reservations for our table will be at 6:30p.
(Thanks to the folks at Social Fun for originally putting this meetup idea together!)

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Memorial Day Weekend, Water Taxi, Harbor Views, Tours and Dinner
